mapper.insert: insert into user_like(`id`, `user_id`, `like_id`,`like_type`,`like_status`,`create_time`,`update_time`) values(#{id}, #{userId}, #{likeId}, #{likeType}, #{likeStatus}, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE like_status=#{likeStatus}, update_time=now()
mapper.delete: delete from user_like where like_type=#{likeType} and like_id=#{likeId} and user_id=#{userId}
